articles.title: Oil prices ease 1% after US Fed warns of higher rates for longer By Reuters - Investing.com
articles.description: Oil prices ease 1% after US Fed warns of higher rates for longer
articles.content:
By Scott DiSavino
NEW YORK (Reuters) -Oil prices fell about 1% to a one-week low on Wednesday after the U.S. Federal Reserve left interest rates unchanged as widely expected, but stiffened its hawki… [+2285 chars]

articles.author: Kshitij Anand
articles.title: Stock Radar: Down about 40% from highs! This specialty chemical stock gave a breakout from a falling trend - The Economic Times
articles.description: The stock hit a 52-week high of Rs 844 on September 16, 2022, but it failed to hold on to the momentum. The stock closed at Rs 512 on September 15, 2023, translating into a fall of over 39%.
articles.content: SynopsisThe stock hit a 52-week high of Rs 844 on September 16, 2022, but it failed to hold on to the momentum. The stock closed at Rs 512 on September 15, 2023, translating into a fall of over 39%.

articles.author: Ram Sahgal, Satish John
articles.title: To mitigate risks, India needs two vibrant bourses, says BSE CEO | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Investors have given a thumbs up to Ramamurthy’s efforts, with BSE's stock rising 128% from  ₹547.3 on 4 January to  ₹1,246.35 on 18 September
